lexUnit.name: shake.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: move forcefully or quickly up and down or to and fro.

sentence.text: Ordering coffee she then pointed to my pullover and shook her finger .
The Prince shook an admonishing finger at the Rifleman then took out his telescope to stare at the battery of French guns .
He shook a finger at the crying figure in the chair .
She shook a finger at him .
But nobody ever came into the woods to shake their finger in my face and lay down the law , the way they did with Gittel in the dorf .
Grimma shook a finger at him .
` Clumsy sod , " he said when he got up shaking his fist at Gordon with the big feet who was marching behind him .
Asshe shook his fist , and advanced threateningly .
He shook his fist at the driver of the estate-car , who had climbed out and was staring blankly across the road .
` Suddenly a Zouave leaves the ranks , shakes his fist and cries , ` Ah !
He shook his head solemnly .
She sat down heavily on one of the garden chairs , shaking her head in shock .
Florrie shook her head vigorously . 'Ernie ai n't left 'er .
She closed her mouth , looked away , and vaguely shook her head .
He shook his head , bitterly disappointed .
The singer who was in court shook his head as the article was read out .
He slipped into his coat and shook his arms to make his shirt cuffs appear .
Ace shook herself to clear her mind .
Whenever you take the dog out of the bath , however , it is advisable to stand back , because invariably the dog will shake itself to remove water from its coat .
Trent shook himself free of the hands that held him and turned his back on the man .
The ash fall became heavier , piling up around them , so that they had periodically to shake themselves clear of it , to prevent themselves being buried .
Jerry shook his arm free .
Britta shook her hair free of the long fingers and their slow stroking .
Dexter shook himself awake .
The girl shook her chin free and firmed her mouth .
Mowbray suddenly shook himself free from his memories .
The Spanish officials had swung open their barriers , wishing her good luck and shaking their heads at her foolishness in returning to France .
On the ceiling , snarling Russians in proletarian caps shook their fists at Lenin .
Its rectangular swimming pool glittered in the sun like an aquamarine and Peach watched swimmers splashing through the water then climbing out and shaking themselves in a shower of crystal drops .
Many people who have spent their holidays in that country , as I have , shake their heads in disbelief as they watch what is happening .
` She 's a shy little girl who needs friends to bring her out of herself ! " their elders had protested , shaking their heads in exasperation at the thoughtlessness of the younger generation .
His friend Okawi had signalled to the other canoes by gently shaking his thumb in the direction of the sleeping animals .
Both sports were clearly popular and well-established traditions ; but when I asked my Indian friends about their survival in modern Delhi , they all shook their heads .
People stretched , shook themselves , smiled .
Her grandmother 's hand held the mug , shaking a little .
Father Barnes 's hands had begun to shake again .
Dexter noticed her hand was shaking faintly and she struck him as keeping her self-control with great difficulty .
Bill is shaking now , feeling convulsing his body , crying for all his remembered dead .
His big blond head kept coming up , shaking once and then bobbing through the water as he struck out for the machine .
His hand still shook slightly .
Shocked and disbelieving , she slowly opened the piece of paper with hands that shook uncontrollably , and it took her a moment to realise what it was .
Father Poole gazed thoughtfully at him , noticing the way his hand shook .
I rest on the top of the wall , my hands shaking , my heart pumping hard .
Joshua gasped as his heavy frame shook .
As I closed the lid he screwed his knuckles into his eyes and his body shook .
He shook with excitement .
He was sitting on the floor among the cracker wrappings and the crumbs , his shoulders shaking , his eyes tight shut .
Clinging to him tightly , she buried her face in his chest , her thin shoulders shaking with sobs of relief .
